attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When you vote, your voters number is placed on a list with the number on your ballot slip(s).

This means that anyone can find out which party or candidate you have voted for.

Voting should be confidential. I got letters through the post from the party I voted for the last time I voted personally addressed to myself.

This crazy action needs to stop.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
